rule: After the colon on each line, the assistant must provide a comma-separated list of extracted entities corresponding to that category.
input: Text: Bill Gates and Melinda Gates Foundation are investing in global health and education.
coverage:
Company names:  
People names: Bill Gates, Melinda Gates  
Specific topics: global health, education  
General themes: philanthropy, investment
validityText:
The input consists of a string of text provided under the key 'text', which is consistent with the input specification. The text includes mentions of company names ("Gates Foundation"), people names ("Bill Gates and Melinda"), specific topics ("investing in global health and education"), and general themes (investment in health and education) all of which fall under the acceptable content outlined by the input specification. 

No violation.
OK
